name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Muichiro Tokito: Serenity and Strength in a Live Theme

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step into Muichiro Tokito’s serene world with stunning visuals and seamless shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dynamic Live Wallpaper: Immerse yourself in the tranquil yet powerful world of Muichiro Tokito with stunning visuals.
Minimalist Design: A clean and elegant interface inspired by Muichiro's calm and composed nature.
Clock and Date: Keep track of time and date at a glance.
Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate instantly to your favorite websites with ease.
Play Games: Access entertaining games directly from your shortcuts for a fun and interactive experience.
Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with the engine selected by the user.
More Extension: Add unique features to enhance your browsing experience with Muichiro Tokito’s serene charm.
